relevant_findings.tophi: Large tophi affecting the small joints of the hands
relevant_findings.fat_masses: Multiple round subcutaneous fat masses over the upper body
relevant_findings.MRI_findings: Widespread and distinct soft masses (fat density) in the subcutaneous layer of the neck region
relevant_findings.ultrasonography_findings: Excessive fat deposition in the mandible and elbows

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Both the fatty masses and renal function remained unchanged 5 months after discharge
